attributes.action: stop Joanna Tapply and Brendan Shaw moving to Huddersfield.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is stop the crazy notion of Jo Jo and Brendan leaving London Town and going to Huddersfield.  We all know that its a ridiculous idea and that no one up there will understand a word that Tapply is saying, and she doesn't like pies.

Act now by appealing to Gordon Brown to ban this planned relocation and protect the future earnings of Battersea and Clapham bar owners.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
